⊢ (((c0 ∈ NrmVec ∧(Scalar ` c0)∈ CMetSp)∧(c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧ c2 ∈ c3))→ c1 ∈ Ban)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Ban ↔(c1 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧(Scalar ` c1)∈ CMetSp))
⊣ c1 =(c0[|`s]c2)
⊣ c3 =(LSubSp ` c0)
⊣ (Scalar ` c0)=(Scalar ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c1, cbn))
-| wb(wcel(c1, cbn), w3a(wcel(c1, cnvc), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms)))
-| wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c0))

⊣ c1 =(c0[|`s]c2)
⊣ c3 =(LSubSp ` c0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c1, cbn), w3a(wcel(c1, cnvc), wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(cfv(csca, c1), ccms)))
-| wceq(cfv(csca, c1), cfv(csca, c1))

⊢ (c1 ∈ Ban ↔(c1 ∈ NrmVec ∧ c1 ∈ CMetSp ∧(Scalar ` c1)∈ CMetSp))
⊣ (Scalar ` c1)=(Scalar ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c1, cbn))
-| wceq(c1, co(c0, cress, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), ccms)), wa(wcel(c1, ccms), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c1, cbn))

⊣ c3 =(LSubSp ` c0)

comment: A complete linear subspace of a normed vector space is a Banach space. We furthermore have to assume that the field of scalars is complete since this is a requirement in the current definition of Banach spaces ~ df-bn . (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2022.)
